titleStmt.title: Description of Free Library of Philadelphia, Lewis E 64: Golden Bull of Charles IV
titleStmt.funder: Council on Library and Information Resources

availability.licence: These images and the content of Free Library of Philadelphia, Lewis E 64: Golden Bull of Charles IV are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. msIdentifier.collection: John Frederick Lewis Collection of European Manuscripts

msContents.summary: This manuscript contains a Golden Bull of Charles IV, Holy Roman Emperor, 1316-1378.

supportDesc.extent: i+36+i; 305 x 210 mm bound to 315 x 222 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Modern foliation in pencil, lower right recto

p.catchwords: Horizontal catchwords; lower inner margin verso; fols 12, 24

layoutDesc.layout: Ruled in hard point; one column of twenty-seven to thirty-four lines; written area: 200 x 125 mm

decoDesc.decoNote: Initials with some decorative pen flourishing and extension of ascenders and descenders

history.provenance: Harrison Wright, Wilkes-Barre, PA; his sale, Davis & Harvey, Philadelphia, June 11, 1908, no. 237; (directly to?) John Frederick Lewis, Philadelphia; given by his widow, Anne Baker Lewis, to the Free Library of Philadelphia in 1936
